mapper.select: select show_image_url imagePath, goods_code goodsCode, sort_no sortNo, begin_time beginTime, end_time endTime from t_picture_show where is_deleted = 0 order by sort_no

select b.goods_code goodsCode, b.goods_name goodsName, b.sale_price salePrice, b.imageurl imagePath, a.hot_sort hotSort from t_hot_goods a RIGHT JOIN t_goods b on a.goods_code = b.goods_code where a.is_deleted = 0 order by a.hot_sort desc
